skills.name: HOT PURSUIT
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Heal a random ally based on your MAGIC stat.
• 50% Chance to inflict Permadeath on the enemy for 1 turn.
• Inflict Sleep on the target for 2 turns if Seal is present on the enemy.

skills.name: ALL POINTS WARNING
desc: • Heal all allies based on your MAGIC stat.
• Grant Increased MAGIC or Magic Penetration to allies for 2 turns.
